snippet.title: Real Warfare: 1242 - Official Trailer
snippet.description: Real Warfare: 1242, a realistic real-time strategy based on authentic historic background, invites you to experience the glorious times of princes, knights and great battles. The players goal is to direct Alexander Nevsky through meticulously recreated historic battlegrounds and achieve greatest victories, repelling attacks of Teutonic and Swedish knights, bringing Lithuania to peace and eliminating every single invader with the knowledge and skills in the Battle of the Ice in 1242.
